218112.「……待たせちゃったかしら？\n 急な お誘いだったのに\n 来てくれて ありが:
Did I keep you waiting? Thank you for coming
on such short notice, I'm so glad you could
make it.

218114.「私……気球に乗るのが 夢だったのよ。\n だから 期間限定で 気球に乗れるって:
I've always dreamed of going on a balloon
ride. So when I heard that it was available
for a limited time, I made a reservation.

218116.「それと 前から あなたと\n のんびり 過ごしてみたかったから……\n 一緒に:
Also, I've always wanted to spend some quality
time with you, so I was wondering if you'd
like to join me.

218120.<pc>と アンルシアは\n気球に 乗り込んだ！:
<pc> and Anlucia both boarded the
balloon!

218198.「おお そなた 無事だったか！\n アンルシア姫も よくやってくれた！:
Oh, you're safe! Princess Anlucia,
you did great!

218200.「……ええ 危機一髪のところでした。\n ルシェンダさまの おかげです。\n け:
Yes, it was a close call, thanks to you,
Lushenda. But... Pyuju got away.

218202.「そうだ！ ルシェンダさま。\n 彼女の荷物は 無事ですか？\n ピュージュが:
Oh, right! Lushenda, are her belongings safe?
It looked like Pyuju was after them...

218204.「荷物自体は 無事のようだが……\n 何かを 盗られた 恐れがあるのか？\n な:
The belongings appeared to be fine, but...
is it possible something may have been stolen?
I think you should take a closer look.

218208.<pc>の だいじなものの中から\n時元神キュロノスが 落とした\n戦禍のタネが:
The Seed of Conflict dropped by Kyuronos
was missing from <pc>'s
important belongings!

218210.「……なに？ 戦禍のタネだと？\n それを 奪われたというのか。:
...What? A Seed of Conflict? That's what they
took from you!?

218212.「ルシェンダさま。\n 戦禍のタネとは いったい なんなのでしょう？\n なぜ:
Lushenda, what exactly is the Seed of
Conflict? And why would Pyuju...?

218214.「……ふむ そうか。そなたたちには\n 戦禍のタネについて 教えてなかったな。\:
...Hmm, right. I didn't tell you about the
Seed of Conflict. Then I will tell you what I
know.

218216.「ガートラントの事件を 覚えているか？\n ピュージュが そっくりの偽者をあやつ:
Do you remember the incident in Gartlant? The one in which Pyuju controlled lookalikes to create chaos in the country by inciting a
civil war?

218218.「私は ガートラント王国と 懇意にしていてな。\n ピュージュが 事件を起こして:
I am on friendly terms with the Kingdom of Gartlant. Ever since the incident with Pyuju, I've been secretly trying to find out what
he's up to.

218220.「その結果…… ピュージュは どうやら\n あるものを求めて 各地に 争いの火種:
As it turned out, Pyuju had been fanning the
flames of conflict throughout the land in
search of something. And that thing was...

218224.「うむ。戦禍のタネは 魔瘴に関わる戦いにより\n 生まれる 戦いの怨念と魔瘴が\:
Yes. Seeds of Conflict are said to be born of
conflicts involving miasma. Both the miasma
and grudges of those conflicts ripen them...

218226.「ピュージュは 人々をだまし 争いを起こしては\n たくさんの戦禍のタネを 生み:
It seems that Pyuju has been manipulating
people and causing conflicts to create and
gather Seeds of Conflict.

218228.「そんなことが あったなんて……。\n でも ピュージュは なんのために……？:
So that's what's been going on...but what
exactly is Pyuju trying to accomplish...?

218230.「そういえば……地獄の扉が 開かれて\n 災いが あふれ出す……と\n ピュージ:
Speaking of which... Pyuju said that the doors
of hell would open, and disaster would
pour forth.

218232.「……そして こうも言っていましたね。\n これで 必要な分が そろった。\n:
...He also said that all the pieces were in
place, and that his desires would soon be
fulfilled...

218234.「……どうやら 事態は 切迫しているようだ。\n これは 一刻も早く ピュージュ:
...It seems that the situation is becoming
more urgent. We must get the Seed of Conflict
back from Pyuju as soon as possible...

218240.「……頼まれていた件の ご報告です！\n ピュージュどもの行き先が つかめました:
...I'm here to report on that thing you asked
me to do! I found out where Pyuju is headed!

218244.「ふふっ 我らの情報網にかかれば お手のモノ！\n ２匹もいたとは 意外でしたが:
Heheh, nothing escapes our information
network! I wasn't expecting two of them...but
this time, we'll catch 'em for sure!

218246.「ピュージュどもは ふた手に分かれ\n 依然 海上を飛行しながら 逃走中です！\:
The Pyujus have split up, and are currently
fleeing across the sea! One of them is headed
to one of the uninhabited Wena Islands...

218248.「もう一方の ピュージュは どうやら\n ゲルト海峡の方角に 向かっているようで:
And the other Pyuju is apparently heading in
the direction of Gert Strait!

218250.「早くしないと ピュージュを逃してしまうわ。\n けれど ２匹のうち どちらが戦:
If we don't do something fast, we'll lose
him... But we don't know which of the two took
the Seed of Conflict...

218252.「……では こうしよう。ウェナ諸島の無人島へ\n 逃げたピュージュは ファルシオ:
...Then this is what we'll do. Anlucia and
Lord Falchion will go after the Pyuju in the
Wena Islands.

218254.「そなたは ゲルト海峡へと逃げた\n ピュージュのほうを 追いかけるのだ。:
And you will go after the Pyuju who has fled
to Gert Strait.

218256.「ふた手に分かれて 追うのですね。\n いいでしょう……。:
So we are splitting into two groups.
Very well...

218258.「まかせてください！\n 必ずや ピュージュを 追い詰めます！:
Leave it to us!
We'll track down Pyuju for sure!

218260.「私は 万が一の事態にそなえ\n スピンドル兵士長と共に ガートラントへ向かい\:
I will head to Gartlant with Spindle and
gather reinforcements, just in case.

218262.「地獄の扉が開く……か。: The doors of hell will open...

218264.「ゲルト海峡に浮かぶ小島……ガミルゴの盾島では\n 島に空いた 大きな穴を 石化:
That small island off the coast of Gert
Strait, called Gamilgo's Shield...it's said a
petrified giant there blocks a giant crevice.

218266.「それは 約５００年前の ガミルゴという術士が\n その大穴……魔界へと通じると:
That giant is actually Gamilgo himself, who
sacrificed himself 500 years ago to seal away
the hole leading to the Demon World.

218268.「術士ガミルゴは 他でもない 私の先祖でな。\n なぜだか 無性に 胸騒ぎがする:
Gamilgo is none other than my ancestor.
That's most likely why I'm feeling so anxious.

218270.「我が身に流れる 父祖の血が\n 危機を知らせているような……。:
It's as if his blood is trying to warn me
about some kind of danger...

218272.「……くれぐれも 気をつけてくれ。\n 武運を祈る。:
...Please proceed with caution.
I wish you good luck.

218274.「あはは♪ もうすこしで……\n あのお方の願いを かなえることができる♪\n:
Ahaha! Just a little longer... and "their"
wish will be fulfilled! And then, something
wonderful will happen!

218276.「……おや おや～？\n 盟友くん じゃないか～♪:
Well, well...
If it isn't the ally!

218278.「ようこそ～！\n この世の地獄……魔界の入り口へ！！:
Welcome! To this world's very own hell...
The entrance to the Demon World!

218280.「あはは あはは～♪\n 戦禍のタネが 喜びに ふるえてる♪\n もうすぐ 魔界:
Ahaha, ahaha! The Seeds of Conflict are
shaking with anticipation! Soon, the door to
the Demon World shall be flung open!

218282.「むかしむかし 戦禍の邪神が空けた 大穴は\n 光の河を貫いて 魔界まで つなが:
Once upon a time, the Dark Deity of War pierced a big hole through the River of Light that led to the Demon World! "They" are quite
looking forward to its opening once again!

218284.「ねえ！ いいこと 思いついたよ～♪\n 彼女のむくろを この儀式の 供物にしよ:
Hey! I've got a great idea! ♪ Let's make her
corpse into an offering for this ceremony!

218286.「さんせ～ さんせ～！\n 歴史的瞬間に 花を添えよう♪:
Hear, hear! Let's add some flowers to this
historic moment!

218288.「あはは 名案だね～！\n とっても 楽しい儀式に なりそうだ！:
Ahaha, that's a great idea! This ceremony
is gonna be so much fun!

218292.「さあ 世にも おそろしい\n 旅芸人ピュージュの 残酷ショーを\n とくと ご:
Now, feast your eyes upon the most cruel
and terrifying show the world has ever
known, by the great minstrel Pyuju!

218296.「でもっ…… もう間に合わないね……♪: But...it's already too late for you... ♪

218298.「タネから あふれだした 戦禍の呪力が\n 封印を破壊して 魔界の扉が 開かれる:
The power from the Seeds of Conflict will
break the seal, opening the door to the Demon
World...and Valdista will soon arrive... ♪

218300.「これで ボクたちの役目は 果たされた♪\n 本当に怖いのは ここからだよ♪:
We've done our duty. Now comes the really
scary part!

218308.「……ほう。\n 少しは やるようだな。: ...Oh? You seem to be somewhat capable...

218310.「だが…… これで 終わりだ。: But...this is the end of the line for you.

218318.「……気に入った。\n お前の命 救ってやろう。: ...I like you. I'll save your life.

218322.なんと <cs_pchero>は\n異形の姿に 変わっていた！:
It seems <cs_pchero> has changed
into quite the grotesque form!

218326.「……ようやく 目覚めたか。\n 待ちくたびれたぞ。:
...You're finally awake.
I was getting tired of waiting.

218328.「どうした ほうけたカオをして。\n 何か 身体に異常でも あったか？<yesn:
What's with that shocked look on your face?
Did you find something wrong with your body?<yesno><close>

218330.「……そうか。なるほど なるほど。\n ならば 血の契約は うまくいったようだな:
...Is that so? I see, I see.
It looks like the blood pact worked, then.

218334.「……俺の名は ユシュカ。\n 見ての通り 魔族の旅人だ。:
...My name is Yushka. As you can see,
I'm just a traveling demon.

218336.「で ここは 魔界。\n 俺たち 魔族が暮らしている 麗しき世界だ。:
And this is the Demon World.
It's the beautiful world where us demons
live.

218338.「まったく ワケがわからない。\n ……というカオを しているな。\n 順を追っ:
You're making that "I have no idea what's
going on..." face. I'll try to explain slowly,
so have a seat.

218340.「……そうだな。\n まず この魔界のことを 教えておこう。:
...Okay. First, let me tell you about the
Demon World.

218342.「アストルティアから 光の河をへだてた\n 近くて遠い世界……:
It's a world both near and far, across the
River of Light from Astoltia...

218344.「……鉄血と暴力の国 バルディスタ要塞。:
...Fortress Valdista, a land of iron, blood,
and violence.

218346.「この辺りは 武力にモノを言わせて\n 拡大を続ける バルディスタに\n 滅ぼさ:
This area is the site of a village that was
destroyed by Valdista, which continued to
expand with the help of its military might.

218348.「そのバルディスタが ついに\n アストルティアに 攻め入ると聞いて\n 俺は:
When I heard that Valdista was finally going
to invade Astoltia, I infiltrated their army.

218350.「そうして 首尾よく アストルティアに\n たどり着いたところで お前が\n 倒:
And so I successfully made it to Astoltia,
where I found you lying on the ground.

218352.「お前は 瀕死の状態だった。\n 普通の回復呪文では 追いつかないほど\n ひど:
You were dying. You were so badly wounded that
ordinary healing spells would not save you.

218354.「しかし 俺は お前を見て 使えると思ってな。\n だから こうして 魔界に連れ:
When I saw you, I thought I could make use of
you. So I brought you to the Demon World and
made a demon blood pact with you.

218356.「この俺の血を そそいでやったんだ。\n その影響で お前は 魔族の姿に変わった:
I have spilt my blood for you. You may have
been transformed into a demon, but you should
be thankful that you're still alive.

218358.「それから お前……\n 俺がくれてやった アビスジュエルは\n ちゃんと 持っ:
Also... I see you have the Abyss Jewel I
gave you.

218360.「その宝石は この魔界を移動するのに\n 欠かせないものだ。\n 好きに 使うが:
That gem is essential for moving through the
Demon World. Use it as you wish.

218362.「……長話にも 飽きたな。\n バルディスタの連中に 見つかっても 面倒だし\n:
...This long talk is tiring. It would be
trouble if the Valdistans found us, so we'd
better get going.

218364.「……どこへ行くか だと？\n しもべのお前が 気にすることではない。:
..."Where are we going", you ask? That's of no
concern to a servant like you.

218366.「……なんだ そのカオは？ お前は\n 血の契約をしたからには 俺のしもべだ。\:
...What's with that look? You made a blood
pact with me, and now you're my servant.
All you have to do is whatever I say.

218368.「そうだ お前……\n まだ 名前を 聞いてなかったな？:
By the way...I haven't asked for your name
yet, have I?

218370.「ふうん……。\n しもべにしては やや不相応な名だが……\n まあ いいだろう:
Hmm...a somewhat inappropriate name for a
servant, but...whatever, it's fine.

218372.「……仕方ないから 教えてやる。\n 向かう先は ゲルヘナ幻野の北側……大審門だ:
...I guess I'll have to tell you anyway. We're
going to the north side of Gerhena Field to
the Demongate. We can talk more there.

218374.「ゲルヘナ幻野は 起伏が多く 迷いやすいが……\n 魔界に慣れるためにも 自力で:
Gerhena Field has many ups and downs, and it's easy to get lost... but to get used to the Demon World, you'll have to get there
yourself. I'll be waiting at the Demongate.

218376.「ちゃんと ここまで 来られたか。\n あれが魔仙卿が住む デモンマウンテンの入:
So you made it this far. That's the
Demongate... the entrance to Demon Mountain
where the Oracle resides. Come, this way.

218378.「いいか。魔界には 各国を治める魔王がいるが\n 本来は その頂点に 大魔王が君:
Listen. In the Demon World, each nation is ruled by a Demon King, but there is also the Demon Lord that rules above them... The
position's been vacant since the last one died, though.

218380.「そして 大魔王を選定する 権限を持つ者こそが\n 魔界の最古老にして 大いなる:
And the one with the authority to anoint the Demon Lord is is the Oracleーthe oldest being in the Demon Worldーand mediator
between the Demon Lord and the Great Source of Darkness.

218382.「……見ろ。\n あいつらは 魔仙卿に会うために\n 大審門に 集まってきた 有:
...Look. They're all here at the Demongate to
meet the Oracle.

218384.「ウハハハ！ まだ 大審門は開かねェのか！！\n 早く 魔仙卿に会わせやがれ オ:
Uhahaha! The Demongate still ain't open yet!?
Hurry up and lemme see the Oracle already!

218386.「……ゲッファッファ！！ バカヤロウ！！\n 次の 大魔王になんのはァ オレ様ァ:
...Gehahah! Fool! The next Demon Lord
will be ME, Grevos!

218388.「……どうした？\n 早く こっちに 来い。:
...What's the matter?
Hurry up and get over here.

218390.「……オレ様に アイサツしねえとは 何様だァ？\n 名を聞けば 魔王すらも 恐れ:
...Who do you think you are, disrespecting me
like that? Don't you know that even the
Demon Kings know to fear Grevos?

218392.「……おっと これは これは。\n 俺は 砂漠の国 ファラザードの使者。\n こ:
...Well, now. I'm just an emissary from the
desert nation of Farazard. I'm unfamiliar with
the customs of this area, so please excuse me.

218394.「じつは ファラザード国の魔王から\n 重要な勅命をたまわり この地に来たのだが:
Actually, I came here on an important mission
from the Demon King of Farazard... do you have
a problem with that?

218396.「……グッ…グヌウ。\n ファラザードの 魔王の使者かよォ。\n め…めんどくせ:
...Gh...ngh. A messenger of Farazard's
Demon King, huh? What a pain.

218398.「今回だけは 見逃してやるッ！\n 次に会ったら 絶対に 喰ってやるからなァ！:
I'll let it slide just this once! But next
time we meet, I'll eat you up for sure!

218400.「……ジャマが入ったな。聞いての通り\n 俺は ファラザードの魔王に仕える者。\:
...Sorry about that. As you just heard, I'm
a servant of the Demon King of Farazard. I'm
working to make my lord the next Demon Lord.

218402.「目的を果たすには なんとしても\n この閉ざされた門を 開かねばならないが……:
To achieve that goal, we must open this gate
at any cost, but... well, you just read the
words written over there.

218404.門には 見慣れない文字が 刻まれている……。: The gate is inscribed with unfamiliar words...

218406.<center>相克する 天運を持つ者 集いし時\n大魔王への道は 開かれる:
When those with opposing fates gather,
the path to the Demon Lord will open.

218408.「古来より 大魔王に選ばれし者は 必ず\n 大審門を通り 他の大魔王資格者との競:
Since ancient times, those chosen to be Demon Lords always passed through the Demongate and claimed the throne by competing with
other candidates.

218410.「ならば 門が開かないのは 大魔王たりうる\n 資格者が この場に そろっていな:
In that case, the reason the gate won't open
is because the ones qualified to be the
Demon Lord aren't all here...

218412.「大魔王たりうる 資格者とは 何者か？\n 我が主 ファラザードの魔王は\n 当:
And who is qualified to be a Demon Lord, you
ask? My lord, the Demon King of Farazard, is
one of them, naturally.

218414.「では 我が主と 相克する天運を持つ者が\n この魔界にいるだろうか？:
So, is there anyone in this Demon World who
is fated to rival my lord?

218416.「それは ファラザード以外の 強国……\n ゼクレス魔導国の 魔王アスバルと\n:
That would be the rulers of the nations
besides Farazard... Demon King Asbal of
Zechres, and Demon Queen Valeria of Valdista.

218418.「だが 彼らは 大魔王の座に興味がないのか\n 一向に この大審門に 現れる気配:
But I guess neither of them have any interest
in the throne, since there's no sign of them
at the gate.

218420.「ゼクレスと バルディスタの魔王に会って\n ここ 大審門へと 引きずり出す。\:
I will meet with the Demon Kings of both
Zechres and Valdista, and drag them both here
to the Demongate. That is my mission.

218422.「……ところで お前。\n どうも その魔族の姿が 気に食わんようだな。:
...By the way. You don't seem all too fond
of your demonic appearance.

218424.「残念ながら 一度 血の契約を交わし\n 魔族の姿へと 変わった者は 二度と\n:
Unfortunately, once a person has entered into a blood pact and becomes a demon, they can never return to their original form. That's
just how the Demon World works.

218426.「……だが たったひとりだけ\n 魔族となったお前を 元に戻しうる者がいる。\n:
...There's only one person who can change you
back from your demon form... and that's the
Oracle that lives beyond this gate.

218428.「ということは……大審門を開けるという\n 俺の目的を果たせば 元の姿に戻るとい:
In other words...if I achieve my goal of
opening the Demongate, you'll reach your goal
of getting back to normal.

218430.「……どうだ。お前にとっても 悪くない話だろ。\n どの道 しもべに 選択肢など:
...How about it? It's not a bad deal for you.
But since you don't really have a choice as a
servant, I expect you to work hard for me.

218432.「ゲルヘナ幻野の東には 魔王アスバルがいる\n ゼクレス魔導国…… 西に向かえば:
To the east of Gerhena Field is Zechres, home
to Demon King Asbal... and to the west is
Demon King Valeria's Fortress Valdista.

218434.「２国のうち どちらからでも かまわない。\n お前に 好きなほうを選ばせてやる:
I don't care which of the two nations we pick
first. I'll let you decide that. Now then,
shall we begin our tour of the Demon World?

230156.「ほら 見て！\n 大風車塔が もう あんなに遠くに！:
Hey, look! The Great Windmill Tower is
already so far away!

230158.「……ねえ。\n 思えば 私たち 一緒に\n たくさんの冒険を してきたわよね。:
Hey... Thinking back, we've had many
adventures together, haven't we?

230160.「いろいろと つらいことも あったけれど\n あなたが いてくれたから\n いつ:
There have been many hard times, but because
of you, I have always been able to get through
them.

230162.「私 気づいたら あなたのことばかり\n 考えているわ……。:
I find myself thinking about you all the
time...

230164.「ねえ……。\n あなたのことは 勇者と盟友の関係以上に\n ……特別な人だと:
You know... I think of our relationship as
more than just Hero and ally...you're very
special to me.

230166.「……あなたにとって 私との関係は\n 勇者と盟友…… だけなのかな？\n それ:
Do you think of our relationship as just Hero
and ally...? Or...am I someone special to you,
too?
<select_nc>
Someone special.
Hero and ally.
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

230170.「こんなにも 思っているのに\n 私の気持ちは 空回りだったというのね。\n ゆ:
I feel so strongly about you, and here you
are just toying with my emotions. I can't
believe it...

230174.「まさか あなたも 同じ気持ちで\n いてくれたなんて……うれしいわ。:
I can't believe you feel the same way...
I'm so happy to hear that.

230178.「あはは！ そんなワケ ないでしょ！\n こんな冗談に 本気になっちゃうなんて\:
Ahaha! There's no chance that'd actually be
true! You're a real idiot for taking something
like this seriously!

230184.「間に合って よかったわ！: I'm glad I made it just in time!

230186.「私の姿に 化ける者よ！\n 正体を 見せなさいっ！！:
How dare you impersonate me!
Who are you, really?!

230188.「……あはは♪\n ホンモノが 来ちゃったなら 仕方ないな～♪:
...Ahaha! If the real one's here,
then I guess I've got no choice now...

230194.「やあやあ！ 盟友くん ひさしぶり～♪\n 旅芸人ピュージュの ドッキリショーは:
Hello there, <if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> ally! It's been awhile!
I hope you're enjoying the amazing Pyuju's
surprise show, yes?

230196.「あなたが…… ガートラントで\n 陰謀を仕掛けたという ピュージュ……！:
You... you're Pyuju, the one who was
scheming in Gartlant...!

230198.「あはは♪ 勇者姫は はじめましてだね！\n 知ってもらえてるなんて 光栄だな～:
Ahaha! Nice to meet you, Hero Princess!
I'm honored that you know me, and came all the
way out here just to see me!

230200.「でもでも 残念ながら……\n もう キミたちに 用はないんだよな～♪: But alas... we have no more use for you...

230202.「ボクたちの目的は そこの彼女が\n 気球に乗る前に 置いてってくれた\n 荷物:
Our goal was in the stuff you left behind
when you got onto that little balloon ride,
actually...

230204.「えっ ふたり いる……？\n どういうこと……！？: There's two of them...? What's going on...!?

230206.「あはは♪ これで 必要な分がそろったんだ！\n ボクらの大願が まもなく かな:
Ahaha! Now all the pieces are in place! Soon
our desire will be fulfilled, and then,
something really scary will happen!

230208.「……地獄の扉が 開かれて\n 恐ろしい 災いが あふれ出すよ♪\n きっと た:
The gates of hell will open, and a terrible
calamity will pour forth! I'm sure that there
will be much bloodshed!

230214.「……ところで。\n あなた すっかり だまされていたようだけど\n 偽者の私…:
By the way... You were fooled by that fake
me, and...well... Did they happen to say
anything weird to you?
<yesno><close>

230218.「……えっ そうなの。\n 私を 特別な人と 思っているのか……って\n 聞かれ:
O...oh, I see...
So they asked you if you thought I was special
to you... Hmm....

230220.「それで……\n あなたは なんて答え……: So, then... what did you tell them...?

230222.「ううん。やっぱり いい！\n 今のは 聞かなかったことにして！: No, never mind! Forget that I even asked!

230224.「……ごめんなさい。\n 今は こんな話 してる場合じゃなかったわね。:
...Sorry. Now's not the time to talk about
this.

230226.「じつは 私が出かけてる時 ルシェンダさまから\n あなたが 危ないという 連絡:
Actually, as I was heading out, I got word
from Lushenda that you might be in danger.
That's why I rushed over this way.

230228.「下で ルシェンダさまが 待っておられるわ。\n いったん 戻りましょう。:
Lushenda is waiting for us below.
Let's head back.

238818.「魔界には 現在\n 特に大きなチカラを持った ３つの国がある。:
In the Demon World, there are currently three
nations with particularly great power.

238820.「魔界で最も古き 悪意の都 ゼクレス魔導国。:
The magic kingdom of Zechres, the oldest and
most malevolent city in the Demon World.

238824.<pc>は アビスジュエルを\n使えるようになった！<me 71>: <pc> can now use the Abyss Jewel!<me 71>

238826.<color_yellow>メインコマンドの 『どうぐ』の中にある\n『アビスジ:
<color_yellow>The Abyss Jewel in the Items menu allows you
to travel between Astoltia and the
Demon World.<color_white>

238828.<color_yellow>さらに 魔界で訪れた場所が 登録されるほか\n各地に:
In addition to visiting registered places in the Demon World, you can also register new places by examining the "Abyss Gates" in each
area.

238830.<color_yellow>魔界では 屋根のある場所でも 使えます。\nまた『元:
In the Demon World, you can use the Abyss Jewel in places with roofs. You can also choose "Return to Astoltia" to go back to a
place quite familiar to you.

238832.<color_yellow>なお アビスジュエルの追加により\n『エテーネルキュ:
<color_yellow>Note that with the addition of the
Abyss Jewel, the Ethenel Cube has been moved
to the Zoomstone menu. <color_white>

246898.……<cs_pchero>は 水の中に落ちた 赤い宝石を\nおそるおそる 拾いあ:
...<cs_pchero> fearfully picks up the red
jewel that fell into the water.

246900.……しかし しばらく 見つめていたら\n不思議と 文字の意味が わかるようになっ:
...But after staring at them for a while,
their meaning slowly became understood.
<pc> read the inscription.

246901.「……じつは ふたりほど 心当たりがある。: ...I have two such cases in mind.

247720.「ボクたちの目的は そこの彼が\n 気球に乗る前に 置いてってくれた\n 荷物の:
Our goal was in the stuff you left behind
when you got onto that little balloon ride,
actually...

247721.「そうだ！ ルシェンダさま。\n 彼の荷物は 無事ですか？\n ピュージュが 狙:
Oh, right! Lushenda, are his belongings safe?
It looked like Pyuju was after them...

247722.「ねえ！ いいこと 思いついたよ～♪\n 彼のむくろを この儀式の 供物にしよう:
Hey! I've got a great idea～♪ Let's make his
corpse into an offering for this ceremony!

255012.「アストルティアを 我らが掌中に！: Astoltia is ours for the taking!
